title: Bosnia and Herzegovina
summary: Bosnia and Herzegovina is a country in Southeast Europe. The capital is Sarajevo. Population: 3.4 million. Area: 51,209 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Bosnia and Herzegovina has a blue field, at the center of which is a large yellow hoist-side facing right-angled triangle that is based on the top edge and spans the height of the field. Adjacent to the hypotenuse of this triangle are nine adjoining five-pointed white stars with the top and bottom stars cut in half by the edges of the field.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
